mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (user_idx, reservation_idx, room_idx, user_comment, rating,review_img_url) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{reservation_idx}, #{room_idx},#{user_comment}, #{rating},#{review_img_url})
mapper.select: SELECT l.LOD_NAME AS lod_name, r.room_name AS room_name FROM ROOM r JOIN LODGMENT l ON r.LOD_IDX = l.LOD_IDX WHERE r.room_idx = #{room_Idx}
select USER_NAME from USERS where USER_IDX=#{user_Idx}

SELECT r.user_idx, r.reservation_idx, ro.ROOM_NAME, l.LOD_NAME, r.ROOM_IDX, r.RATING, r.REVIEW_IMG_URL, r.USER_COMMENT, r.LOD_COMMENT, r.created FROM REVIEW r INNER JOIN ROOM ro ON r.ROOM_IDX = ro.ROOM_IDX INNER JOIN LODGMENT l ON ro.LOD_IDX = l.LOD_IDX INNER JOIN PAYMENT p ON r.reservation_idx = p.reservation_idx WHERE r.USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND p.STATUS = 'paid'
